cardboard.title: Cardboard
cardboard.hint: Put in the CARDBOARD container — corrugated/shipping boxes only; flatten.

mixed.title: Mixed Recycling
mixed.hint: Put in MIXED — plastics #1/#2 (check triangle), metal cans, mixed paper/paperboard (e.g., cereal/tissue boxes).

trash.title: Trash / Not Accepted
trash.hint: TRASH here: glass, plastic bags/bagged recyclables, greasy pizza boxes/food-soiled items, clamshell plastics, electronics/yard/construction/hazardous.
